notes.text: Core: DragInfo/DropInfo are added to configure drag-and-drop
sap.m.IconTabBar: Drag&Drop is enabled in overflow
QUnit Designtime Library tests in Firefox
sap.m.Dialog: correct padding of the subheader when Toolbar is used
sap.m.FacetFilter: focus correctly set on a FacetFilterList in SingleSelectMaster mode
sap.m.ObjectHeader: prevent tap Event when tap is not on a active element
sap.m.ObjectNumber: Invisible text for the ValueState updated correctly on setState
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Now the width is consistent in all browsers
sap.m.SegmentedButton: native browser focus outline removed
sap.m.TabContainer: Scrolling issue in RTL on Safari corrected
sap.m.BusyDialog: StyleClass methods are now forwarded to the inner Dialog
sap.m.DatePicker- change of displayFormat updates the placeholder
sap.m.MessageBox: improve documentation
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Reset cached sizes on control reset
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Custom appointments sorter
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: appointments have correct legend colors now
sap.m.TimePicker: Value is set correctly on change.
sap.m.Wizard: Next button improved accessibility
sap.ui.unified.Calendar: nonWorkingDays now can have another type when set using specialDates aggregation
sap.m.Button: Now the icons are with the correct color when Reject/Accept/Emphasized + Disabled
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Focus shouldn't jump out of the control.
sap.m.Input: SelectedItem is now correctly set when tap is pressed
sap.m.Panel: Control html is now valid
sap.m.Popover: Remove unneeded scroll
sap.m.QuickView: Auto closing is now fixed
sap.m.StepInput: pressing PageUp or PageDown doesn't scroll the page now
sap.ui.unified.MenuListItem: Arrow positioned correctly in compact mode
Form: new column-based layout
sap.m.DateTimePicker: properly show TimePicker in Edge
sap.m.Dialog: stretch property when using content size fixed
sap.m.MultiInput: Tokenizer in Safari is no longer cut off
sap.m.Page: Escape title properly
sap.m.SegmentedButton: removeItem, removeItems, removeButton and removeButtons return the removed elements
sap.m.TextArea: Counter text changed
sap.m.TileContainer: Tile is initially visible now if TileContainer contains only one tile
sap.m.TimePicker: The placeholder now is correctly displayed in IE after focusout
getScrollDelegate: Lookup scroll delegate across components
sap.m.Table: Enhancing the stickiness of the column headers
Opa: make polling consistent when using execution delay
RatingIndicator: Adapt labeling in ACC test page
sap.m.Button: Combine buttons change handler generates stable ID now
sap.m.CheckBox: Test page adjusted
sap.m.ColorPalette: focus indication for IE, Edge in standard theme is fixed.
sap.m.DateTimePicker: when picker is opened for IE & Edge, input should not be focusable
sap.m.FacetFilter: correct navigation with arrow keys
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Focus is lost after growing
sap.m.Image: Test page adjusted
sap.m.PagingButton: Test page adjusted
sap.m.Select: Select is focused before opening the dialog on mobile
sap.m.TileContainer: Custom tiles show now visual indication of deletion
sap.m.Toolbar: Test page adjusted
Opa: revert make polling consistent when using execution delay
sap.m.Dialog: Problem with positioning on IOS devices is now fixed
sap.m.IconTabBar: Disabled tabs are no longer selectable
sap.m.Input: SelectedKey is lost if oData is used as data source
sap.m.LightBox: correctly remove resize listener
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Accessibility=false doesn't throw an error
sap.m.ObjectStatus: marks Event ontouchstart
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: 1 Month view navigation between months is fixed.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: customData for PlanningCalendarRow is fully supported.
sap.m.SearchField: Buttons now have default tooltips
sap.m.Slider, sap.m.RangeSlider: AriaLabelledBy is now forwarded to handles
sap.m.TabContainer: correct tab  close button size
sap.m.TextArea: The focus and the background are now correct
sap.m.TileContainer: active page is displayed correct now.
sap.m.TileContainer: after new page is added, scrollers remain visible.
sap.m.Tree: API to expand/collapse multiple nodes is added
Reverts commit c71ae11fe2718cbb2043bfe9be8306314514b262
reverts commit 683d922825b46df730c9d9a13596806e7842a0a5.
sap.m.DateTimeField: new method getDisplayedPlaceholder introduced
sap.m.FormattedText: Link wrapping and sizing improved
sap.m.Image: Ensured image change in case of detailBox
sap.m.Input: Change event is now fired correctly with HelpDialog
sap.m.MultiInput: Change event is now fired correctly
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Navigation in one month view works propperly
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Now the deselection of a non-existing element is handled correctly
sap.m.QuickView: Parent container is not re-rendered any more
sap.m.RadioButton: getAccessibilityInfo method added
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: select event is no longer fired twice
sap.m.MenuButton: now supports positioning of the menu
sap.m.Button, sap.m.MenuButton, sap.m.ToggleButton: press state inside Toolbar and List fixed
sap.m.DateTimePicker: sap.m.SegmentedButton is now correctly alligned
sap.m.NumericContent: Images on tiles go decorative, no 'undefined' in Aria
sap.m.SearchField: screen reader announce the placeholder text when there is label or tooltip
sap.m.Select: Value state information is now read
sap.m.TablePersoController: works now also with "late attachment"
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: correct filter examples
ResponsiveTable: Support of Grid Layout Popin for Edge >= 16
sap.m.Button: enable hide/unhide actions for RTA
sap.m.IconTabBar: Drag&Drop between header and overflow list is now enabled
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Drag and drop of appointments between rows is now enabled
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Resizing of appointments is now possible
m.IconTabHeaderMode: allowed values should be @public
sap.m.Carousel: In popup Carousel doesn't closes any more
sap.m.DatePicker: Now in IE & touch devices the focus is correct after closing the picker
sap.m.DateTimePicker: when picker is opened for IE & Edge, input should not be focusable
sap.m.GenericTile/SlideTile: API property for enforcing small size changes from boolean to new enum, tile sample extended
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: correct header icon size
sap.m.Select: Popover width on zoom out fixed
sap.m.StepInput: do not create global NumericInput
sap.m.Switch: Description when checked off fixed
sap.m.TabStrip: do not create global CustomSelectList and CustomSelect
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: New property growing added
sap.ui.core.dnd: dragEnd and dragOver events are added
sap.m.DatePicker: fix failing unit tests
sap.m.FacetFilter: Summary text is correct when a list is filtered
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fix failing unit test on combi devices
sap.m.TabContainer: Selected items are correct after closing or removing items
sap.m.TimePicker: In compact mode zoomed out sliders are aligned
sap.m.semantic.SelectConfiguration: Role overriding removed
sap.m.DateTimePicker: minutesStep and secondsStep for the time sliders are now introduced
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Copy appointments by dragging is now enabled
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Creating appointments with dragging is now possible
sap.m.Slider: ExternalTooltip aggregation introduced
sap.m.Table: enable sticky header toolbars
sap.m.ComboBoxTextField: Zooming out no longer cuts the border
sap.m.GroupHeaderListItem: count and title should not be separated
sap.m.IScale: documentation corrected
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: ObjectAttribute gets no longer truncated in active state
sap.m.Panel: Tabindex is now added only in FF
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: wrap title of the row
sap.m.Popover: Do not attach resize handler on destroyed popovers
sap.m.Popover: popover position fixed
sap.m.Rangeslider: Rendering without tooltips fixed
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Interaction area of star symbols enlarged
sap.m.SegmentedButton: destroyItems destroys all internal buttons
sap.m.Slider: Setting a value should not throw an error
sap.m.Switch: Fixed focus outline
sap.m.Tokenizer: fixed width
sap.m.IconTabBar: tabDensityMode property implemented
sap.m.PlanningCalendarRow: introducing specialDates aggregation
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Reset button added
sap.m.Column: rendering of items should not change the merge state
sap.m.MessageBox: Show API Reference link in documentation
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Align styles in compact
sap.m.MultiInput: Single pasted values are not turned into tokens
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: used in active state in a table gets no longer truncated
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: The title control is visible if it's changed back and forth to active
sap.m.RadioButton: Control's width corrected in Form
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: adds default aggregation to be in sync with sap.m.Popover
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Title of Dialog is also set
sap.m.SelectDialog: New growing property added
sap.m.StepInput: Typing more characters than displayValuePrecision's limit causes a temporarily error state
Icon Explorer - Fix unstable OPA test
sap.m.FormattedText: DemoKit sample not shown completely fixed
sap.m.Page: Do not focus on the hidden footer.
sap.m.ComboBox: Selecting items is now working in IE
sap.m.FormattedTextAnchorGenerator: Anchor tag conversion improved
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: correct header aligment when icon is used
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fix title of the row when there is no image
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: load not density aware image by default
sap.m.Slider: Tickmarks/Labels responsiveness fix
sap.m.Text: Normalisation and visualisation of line endings and whitespace characters is now fixed
sap.m.TileContainer: reposition tiles when resize happens
sap.m.BusyDialog: Close event is now fired correctly
sap.m.ComboBox: Updating with special characters is now correct
sap.m.FacetFilter: Now the control handles filters correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: Remove additional tab stop in Light mode
sap.m.FacetFilterList: Calls to the backend are now optimized
sap.m.IconTabBar: Overflow arrows in header is now fixed
sap.m.Input: step attribute set to any
sap.m.ObjectListeItem: render properly hidden marker
sap.m.ObjectStatus: text / icon alignment is correct now
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Corrected content focus preserving
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Corrected content focus preserving
sap.m.SegmentedButton: right border of the last visible sub item is now displayed
sap.m.Dialog: Origin is now set on Space and Enter
P13DimeasurePanel: Align items with chart API
SliderTooltipContainer: Positioning available for subclasses
m.DateTimePicker: Closing software keyboard leaves correct height
m.FacetFilterList: Active state is never set internally
sap.m.DateTimePicker: set min/max date does not modify its time part now.
sap.m.FacetFilter: Facet Buttons announced only once
sap.m.Label: Color is now correct inside an active list item
sap.m.MaskInput: on Android, caret positioning is improved.
sap.m.MenuButton: Button now looks correctly when on formfactor change
sap.m.MenuButton: enabled property works correctly now
sap.m.MessageView: Segmented buttons now have tooltips
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: Press event is fired on IE and Edge
sap.m.ObjectListItem:  Attributes get the whole space when alone
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog - press reset then cancel button behavior is fixed.
Wizard: Invalidation when going to next step prevented
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: renew item navigation after page load
sap.m.ObjectMarker: suppress rerendering of the inner controls onBeforeRendering
sap.m.Panel: Drawing in IE when animated
sap.m.SelectionDetailsItemLine: Enable number as value in SelectionDetailsItemLine
sap.m.Tokenizer: Start token selection with arrow right
sap.m.Dialog: Problem with z-index on Safari is now fixed
sap.m.MultiInput: Focus outline corrected in IE
sap.m.ObjectHeader: has padding now, when IconTabBar has no data
sap.m.QuickView: Control height is now correct
sap.m.RadioButton: Selection now visible in print
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: removeAllButtons now works well
sap.m.FacetFilter: Added filters are displayed now
sap.m.ComboBox: Items' loading indicator returned back
sap.m.ComboBox: Keyboard flashing when item selected fixed
sap.m.DatePicker: valueFormat in case of invalid entry works now
sap.m.FacetFilter: update FacetPage on navigating
sap.m.Label: Color is now correct inside an active list item in table
sap.m.Select: aria-live in opened popover removed
sap.m.Slider: Fix examples page under IE
sap.m.TabContainer: Selecting item from SelectList works correctly on IE
sap.m.TabContainer: initially selected item is now scrolled into view
sap.m.UploadCollection : While grouping named model is ignored and always default model is taken without considering the model bind to items aggregation.
sap.m - Table Designtime DomRef definition for items aggregation
OverflowToolbar: Cleared focus info upon focus leave
sap.m.BusyDialog: Busy information now read out
sap.m.BusyDialog: The dialog is now closing correctly
sap.m.DateTimePicker: Popup is now correctly displayed
sap.m.Dialog: ESC key sets 'origin' event parameter correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: search with relative item binding works now.
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: doesn't wrap in ObjectPageHeaderContent in IE
sap.m.Page: contentOnlyBusy proper behavior
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: visual fix of the DatesRow on hover
sap.m.Popover: Default sizes
sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions width is now correct
sap.m.UploadCollection : Uploaded files were showing incorrect size so set property binaryFilesize as true so that file size formating uses base 2.
sap.m: Manual downport of i18n properties
Popover: RTA toolbar don't disappear anymore during UI Adaptation
sap.m.Button: now checks if the domRef exists on onAfterRendering
sap.m.ComboBox: Change event is now fired on highlighting on phone
sap.m.Dialog: Prevent infinite resize in IE and Edge
sap.m.Input: Soft keyboard is not opened on value help
sap.m.MessageView: Stuck on filtering fixed
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Correct arrangement of the items in case parent has white-space set to nowrap
sap.m.StepInput: correct behavior when mousewheel is used
sap.m.TabContainer: propagete properties to internal TabStripItem
sap.m.TextArea: Stop textarea "jumping" on counter update
sap.m.TextArea: growingMaxLies property fixed
sap.m.Token: Token text properly displayed
FacetFilter: Filter dialog has an aria message
MaskInput: Accessibility exampe is improved
ObjectMarker: Accessibility info appears when in a table cell
ObjectMarker: New properties ariaLabelledBy & ariaDescribedBy
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: render parent div when empty
sap.m.TimePicker: if binding format differs from input, "change" is fired
sap.m.Wizard: Stable ID restored
OverflowToolbar: Fixed resetting of child size cache

sap.m.GenericTile : In IE11 when a DOM Element which is only partially visible in the browser viewport gets the focus, the IE 11 browser shifts the element to make it fully visible in the viewport. This has conflict with UI5 event onTap detection.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: prevent default actions, only when click is on its none-active parts
sap.m.ObjectHeader: status rendered in correct column when the attribute is empty
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Accessibility description corrected
sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Set the focus to the body after dialog is closed
sap.m.MultiInput: Fire change event on enter on mobile
sap.m.WizardStep: Next button visibility adjusted
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: shows selectAll checkBox at the correct position
sap.m.Carousel: content of scroll containers is now destroyed correctly
sap.m.ComboBox: Deleting a special characters now work correctly
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: now implements getAccessibilityInfo function
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: pass tooltip to the StandardListItem
sap.m.Wizard: nextStep handling in branching fixed
sap.m.Dialog: Adjust width when dialog contains long items
sap.m.GroupHeaderListItem: Should not have action cursor
sap.m.Input: showValueStateMessage now works correctly
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Now the press event is correctly fired
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Pressing close button triggers search event
sap.m.TimePicker: gets correct locale
sap.m.uploadCollectionItem : Fixed .csv file download issue.
ComboBoxBase: Support for composition characters
sap.m.Dialog: Improve aria-labelledby
sap.m.FacetFilter: search on all binding parts for text
sap.m.GenericTile : Refractored default Tooltip to contain Header,Sub-header and TileContent.
sap.m.LightBox: Image is now loading correctly
sap.m.MessagePopover: MessageView's auto binding fix
sap.m.MultiInput: Pressing left arrow no longer deletes a token
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: do not throw exception  when special chars are used in title
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Markers layout fixed
